name: Dungeon Siege: Throne of Agony
description:
Silenced beneath the sea for a millennium, the vengeful screams of Malith the Betrayer have been unleashed.

    Fight to build your hero and bring justice to the Throne of Agony
    An all-new adventure developed exclusively for the PSP system
    Face over 100 monsters - familiar Dungeon Siege favourites, plus many all-new creatures
